name: 3AM at the Shack (KomodoRexGAMES)
description:
WELCOME TO THE SHACK....
You are a babysitter who has to stay at a creepy abandoned house for a night, but it's not a normal abandoned house, it's full of killers ready to kill you...
CAN YOU SURVIVE?
ARROW KEYS TO MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT
PRESS M TO TURN ON MUSIC
F TO TURN THE FLASHLIGHT ON AND C TO CLOSE IT
Other controls are said in - game
